Angie's List | Onsite (Indianapolis, IN, USA) / Remote (Worldwide)

We're a home services company that's still a sales organization at heart but we're making a hell of an effort at upping our technology game. We recently completed the first stage of our transition from .NET to a Scala stack.

We're looking for talented software engineers of all walks of life to join our growing team -- no Scala experience required (though it helps).

Interview process: We'll reach out to you via email, schedule a phone screen (maybe two), and then do an in person interview. Fairly fast turnaround, though the whole process can take a month or two depending on how busy things are.

Send a resume to dylann@angieslist.com and I'll personally make sure it gets to the right hands.

You can also apply through taleo: https://chm.tbe.taleo.net/chm01/ats/careers/searchResults.js...
